paragraph.heading: 2XML
3Formatting
paragraph.paragraph:
To pretty format an XML document for easier reading and editing click the
prettyxmltoolbar.png toolbar button. For this to work the document must be a valid XML document.
paragraph.heading: 3Schemas
paragraph.paragraph: To load an XML schema for the project go to Project -> Settings
Then load the schema through the 'Schema' tab. Once the schema is loaded you can view the types and document elements in the the 'Types' and 'Schema Elements' tabs in the main navigator.

Once a schema is loaded you can validate the currently loaded document to the schema structure by clicking this toolbar button:
schemavalidatortoolbar.png . In the case of errors an error dialog will appear. Double-clicking on a particular schema error will highlight that error in the editor for a quick fix. If you wish to validate the entire project XML documents to the schema go to Tools -> Validator and select the option 'Validate project documents against schema definition'. All files not schema valid will be listed in the error list and can be clicked to open each document.
paragraph.heading: 3Quick tags
paragraph.paragraph: To quickly input tags that are known to the editor through the loaded just right-click in the text and the editor will display a drop down list of available tags based upon the cursor position.
If you right click over highlighted text and select a tag it will enclose the highlighted text in that tag
paragraph.heading: 3Headers and Footers
paragraph.paragraph: You may define a external header or footer file to be included when transforming your XML documents to another output format. Go to Project -> Settings
Then load the header or footer through the 'Includes' tab.
paragraph.heading: 3Document Properties
paragraph.paragraph:
If your document is valid XML click the
docprops.png toolbar button to view document specific properties. The dialog allows you to specify meta-information about the document regarding the
../filters/index.xml output filter to which the document relates, plus information for producing
../help_projects/index.xml help projects and
../../toc/index.xml toc related information .
